title: My MAN SWAINNN
body: so when is my man swwain{{champion:50}}  gonna get a VGU i been waiting patiently ... stop sleeping riot make that shit happen tonite....kthxbye

replies.body: I can say you not this year, I expect 2019, maybe 2018

I _really _ want it to be 2018 with a Noxus lore event. 

That could honestly be so cool. I really want more Noxus art too.

yeah me too, sure i prefer void, but noxus is still great. Reav3 will release after Urgot rework the 2 champs that get a rework between pre season 8 and mid season 8 maybe it is Swain , but I think nunu and morder will be before swain so.... I hope with you guys ^^

Muahahahahaha
Faux i know you are doing exploration, if you happen to be on Swain i hope you do a good job.

Nunu and Morde would be totally rad too, less so than Swain :P. 

I would prefer a Void event too, but Noxus would be pretty bad ass if not Void.
From hints Rioters teased recently. There is a glimpse of hope we would see Swain listed to be updated right after Urgot or Eve.
Swain is on the list for a VGU. We won't know who'll be up next until both the Urgot & Evelyn VGU's release.
well thats just some bafoolery hes a goddam noxian general put some respect on his name..

Your not alone.

I'm really hoping they don't completely turn him into a Noxian general with him having war camps and all that. They should almost ditch the general or tactician aspect, focus more on a leading warlock of Noxus. 

Me and Tides of Blood speculated what he might do in game after his VGU a while back, although it was a while back. Like near the MYMU.
Swain skin 2020 quote me on that.
